alert.note: Alert for Mahoning; Stark (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 1:52AM EDT until July 25 at 2:30AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Mahoning County in northeastern Ohio... Northeastern Stark County in northeastern Ohio... * Until 230 AM EDT. * At 152 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hartville, or 10 miles northeast of Canton, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Canton, Salem, Alliance, Louisville, Sebring, Beloit, Limaville, Maple Ridge, Maximo and Greenford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM EDT for northeastern Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM EDT for northeastern Ohio.
